title: तथ्य-जांच: क्या अयोध्या फैसले के बाद पीएम मोदी ने भारत के मुख्य न्यायाधीश को बधाई पत्र लिखा?

vclaim: Thanks @narendramodi@PMOIndia for the kind words. Nothing of this would have been possible without love and support of our fellow countrymen. All these deeds are dedicated to our country. pic.twitter.com/3P3HcViIJ5
